@TvManga20206 -- Thank you for the https://nhentai.net/g/287888/ link. And I can see what BZo14806 is saying. However, I see both Miyuki and Kotaro as being broken before the end. Both are still socially functional though. -- For Miyuki page 38 is what I see as the turning point. The breaking point. Where she goes beyond saving. Shows she's actually broken. -- Much much later, page 92, she says she wants to go back to her "old relationship" with Kotaro. Girl, are you fucking high? Only someone "broken" could even think that's possible after all she's done. Especially after she finds out Kotaro knows on page 38. "You'll forgive me, right ...?" That statement screams denial, delusion.  She's been broken for a long time by then. -- Its Kotaro who forces Miyuki to realize what she's done, been doing, on page 94.  Its Kotaro who crushes her delusions.

@SirRobin Thanks for clear it up for me dude You understand what happened the point of that story to me is that Kotaro is not a idiot. She should told him what happen. Not let him found out the hard way. To me that a perfect ending for me. Any suggestions on what link a NTR revenge on so I can collect? Thanks 😊

@SirRobin Kotaro was completely broken by the time he banged Miyuki at the end of chapter 4. She wasn't, and even in the epilogue it could be argued that she still isn't. Both at the end of the epilogue are just using sex with random people to run away from everything Hoshino and the president put them through at the club. Just don't see it as revenge, myself.

@bzo1480 -- I don't see Beta getting revenge/justice on Alpha. I see Beta getting revenge/justice on girlfriend and bitch. -- Beta makes girlfriend realize that she is truly broken. That she was in denial. Afterall, she went back to Alpha and continued cheating even after she found out Beta knew. -- Beta ends their relationship. Not girlfriend or Alpha. Beta crushes girlfriend's last hope. Not girlfriend or Alpha. -- Beta only lets bitch who setup girlfriend be a side piece. Yeah she's knocked up but Beta clearly doesn't love her. Isn't devoted to her. And bitch goes on a rant when she gets drunk because she knows her plan ultimately failed. That she's failed. While Beta goes out and bangs babes.
@TvManga2020 Wait, what revenge was in that Yasu story? Kotaro got revenge on nobody aside from punching the president once.
